content:
TITLE: Generating Random UUID in Rust
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to generate a new random UUID using the v4 feature
SOURCE: https://github.com/uuid-rs/uuid/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: rust
CODE:
```
use uuid::Uuid;

let id = Uuid::new_v4();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Parsing UUID String in Rust
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates parsing a UUID string and checking its version, without requiring additional crate features
SOURCE: https://github.com/uuid-rs/uuid/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: rust
CODE:
```
use uuid::{Uuid, Version};

let my_uuid = Uuid::parse_str("67e55044-10b1-426f-9247-bb680e5fe0c8")?

assert_eq!(Some(Version::Random), my_uuid.get_version());
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing UUID Crate Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Cargo.toml configuration for adding the uuid crate as a dependency with v4 feature for random UUID generation
SOURCE: https://github.com/uuid-rs/uuid/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: toml
CODE:
```
[dependencies.uuid]
version = "1.16.0"
# Lets you generate random UUIDs
features = [
    "v4",
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using UUID String Literal in Rust
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to create a UUID constant from a string literal using the uuid! macro
SOURCE: https://github.com/uuid-rs/uuid/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: rust
CODE:
```
use uuid::{uuid, Uuid};

const ID: Uuid = uuid!("67e55044-10b1-426f-9247-bb680e5fe0c8");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Example UUID Format
DESCRIPTION: Shows the standard format of a UUID string representation with hexadecimal digits separated by hyphens
SOURCE: https://github.com/uuid-rs/uuid/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
67e55044-10b1-426f-9247-bb680e5fe0c8
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Rust with Backtrace Enabled
DESCRIPTION: Command to run Cargo build with RUST_BACKTRACE environment variable set to 1, which enables backtrace for debugging purposes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/uuid-rs/uuid/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo build
```
